questions.body:
*[Registration 1/10]*

What is your gender?

1) Male
2) Female
3) Prefer not to say

*[Registration 2/10]*

Please confirm your population group?

1) African
2) Coloured
3) Indian
4) White
5) Other

*[Registration 3/10]*

Are you a South African Citizen?

1) Yes
2) No

*[Registration 4/10]*

How old are you?

1) 18-29 years old
2) 30-34 years old
3) 35-50 years old
4) 51-65 years old
5) Above 65 years old

*[Registration 5/10]*

Which Province do you live in?

1) Eastern Cape
2) Free State
3) Gauteng
4) KwaZulu Natal
5) Limpopo
6) Mpumalanga
7) Northern Cape
8) North West
9) Western Cape

*[Registration 6/10]*

What is your employment status?

2) Part-time employed
3) Self-employed
4) Unemployed
5) Employed

*[Registration 7/10]*

What sector are you employed in?

1) Public sector
2) Private Sector
3) Student or unemployed

*[Registration 8/10]*

What is your personal monthly income including stipends, grants, wages and other income?

1) No income
2) R1 - R3 000
3) R3 001 - R8 000
4) R8 001 - R15 000
5) R15 001 - R25 500
6) Over R25 500

*[Registration 9/10]*

What is your highest level of education?

1) 0 - Grade 9
2) Grade 9 - less Matric
3) Completed Matric
4) Post Matric Qualification

*[Registration 10/10]*

Do you have a disability?

1) Yes
2) No
